elements.name: Curbside flow type-3 - Pay Now - Make a successful payment with valid card details for curbside flow

steps.name: I open the Onedine application in the mobile browser
I enter the spot code as 'PAI11CU' in the seven digit spot code field
I tap on submit button
I verify that it navigate to check-in screen and Sign in button is displayed
I tap on Sign In button
I navigate to the Sign In screen
I tap on the link Sign in with a password
I enter valid login credentials from the excel sheet name "Login_Success"
I tap on Sign In button present in Login Screen
I navigate to spot number screen and verify the message displayed on the screen
I enter the Spot Number from the excel sheet "SpotNo_Success" in the Spot Number field
I tap on next arrow button and submit the spot number
I should be able to navigate to 'Order' screen
I verify that selected category is 'Entrees'
I scroll down the page till 'Cheese ravioli with marinara and chicken' menu and select the menu
I tap on order button with 'Cheese ravioli with marinara and chicken' item to add it to the menu
I should be able to navigate to menu details screen
I select 'Fettuccini' , 'Sausage' and 'Alfredo' as the required modifiers
I tap on Add to Bag button
I tap on My Bag from bottom footer
I should be able to navigate to 'My Bag' screen
I click on the next buttton
I should be able to navigate to checkout screen
I verify that added menu is being displayed in the screen
I tap on Pay Now button
I should be able to navigate to Payment screen of the application
I enter the valid card details into the fields from the excel sheet name "Payment_Success"
I select No Tip as a tip amount
I tap on Pay Now button available on payment screen
I tap on Confirm button to proceed the payment
I am on payment confirmation screen

elements.name: Curbside flow type-3 - Pay later (Pay At Restaurant) to make a successful order

steps.name: I open the Onedine application in the mobile browser
I enter the spot code as 'PAI11CU' in the seven digit spot code field
I tap on submit button
I verify that it navigate to check-in screen and Sign in button is displayed
I tap on Sign In button
I navigate to the Sign In screen
I tap on the link Sign in with a password
I enter valid login credentials from the excel sheet name "Login_Success"
I tap on Sign In button present in Login Screen
I navigate to spot number screen and verify the message displayed on the screen
I enter the Spot Number from the excel sheet "SpotNo_Success" in the Spot Number field
I tap on next arrow button and submit the spot number
I should be able to navigate to 'Order' screen
I verify that selected category is 'Beverages'
I scroll down the page till 'Coffee' menu and select the menu
I tap on order button with 'Coffee' item to add it to the menu
I should be able to navigate to menu details screen
I tap on Add to Bag button
I tap on My Bag from bottom footer
I should be able to navigate to 'My Bag' screen
I click on the next buttton
I should be able to navigate to checkout screen
I verify that added menu is being displayed in the screen
I tap on Pay at the Restaurant button available on the Payment screen
I tap on Order Now button
I tap on Confirm button to proceed the payment
I am on payment confirmation screen

elements.name: Online Pickup - Pay Now to make a successful payment with valid card details

steps.name: I open the Onedine application in the mobile browser
I enter the spot code as 'PAI11OL' in the seven digit spot code field
I tap on submit button
I verify that it navigate to check-in screen and Sign in button is displayed
I tap on Sign In button
I navigate to the Sign In screen
I tap on the link Sign in with a password
I enter valid login credentials from the excel sheet name "Login_Success"
I tap on Sign In button present in Login Screen
I should be able to navigate to Pickup screen
I enter the Name as 'John Doe' , select Pickup Date as 'Tomorrow' and select Pickup time as '08:45 PM'
I submit the Next button with all the mandatory fields
I should be able to navigate to 'Order' screen
I verify that selected category is 'Entrees'
I scroll down the page till 'Cheese ravioli with marinara and chicken' menu and select the menu
I tap on order button with 'Cheese ravioli with marinara and chicken' item to add it to the menu
I should be able to navigate to menu details screen
I select 'Fettuccini' , 'Sausage' and 'Alfredo' as the required modifiers
I tap on Add to Bag button
I tap on My Bag from bottom footer
I should be able to navigate to 'My Bag' screen
I click on the next buttton
I should be able to navigate to checkout screen
I verify that added menu is being displayed in the screen
I tap on Pay Now button
I should be able to navigate to Payment screen of the application
I enter the valid card details into the fields from the excel sheet name "Payment_Success"
I select No Tip as a tip amount
I tap on Pay Now button available on payment screen
I tap on Confirm button to proceed the payment
I am on payment confirmation screen

name: One Dine - mWeb Application Regression Scenarios
description: As a Registered user, I want to test regression sceanrios of the application
